overview: Paul Granville becomes a famous painter for his portraits of great women as modeled by the beautiful Joline Hofer. When one of Paul's paintings appears to result in a miracle, Joline's life is changed forever. She leaves her previous life to live one of service and piety, a decision that ultimately saves Paul's life.
tagline: Once in a Decade there comes a story that grips you to the soul with its emotion, that makes you feel life is worth living after all.
title: Revelation
